ygData.subject: Re: enchanter only robes
ygData.msgSnippet: The stats are the same, it is just a robe unique to our class.
ygData.messageBody:
The stats are the same, it is just a robe unique to our class.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Freedom [SMTP:sysgod@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, July 06, 1999 7:45 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] enchanter only robes
>
> In Felwithe the robe is not enchanter only but the jr and senior
> apprentice robes are no trade no drop and the senior is 6 ac and +1mana
> what are the stats on the gold one.
>
> Sloop wrote:
>
> > Although I could by this point easily have an FBR or something of the
> > sort, I stick with my Gold Senior Apprentice robe, just because it's
> > enchanter only. Think of it as 'Enchanter Pride'. I think that there
> > should be some decent enchanter only robes, which of course would be
> > quest items, and no trade/ no drop, and lore. This goes for the other
> > spellcasting classes as well.-Sloop
>
